title: *Free Rent* Beautiful 1 Bedroom, 2 Bath - Beverly Hills Adjacent
posting_body: **Advertised rent is net pricing of the unit when factoring in 1/2 of 2nd month free on a 12 month lease.
Actual rent paid to landlord is $2,095/month.*
Spacious 1 bedroom 2 BATH apartment for lease.
Stainless appliances, granite counters, hardwood floors and windows that provide natural light are some things that you do not want to pass on.
This building is also centrally located in Los Angeles.
Minutes to LACMA, Cedars-Sinai, Beverly Center, The GROVE and the 3rd Street 's finest shopping and dining!
Pets Policy: Small pets under 25lbs allowed with additional $500 deposit and monthly pet rent ($50/dog & $25/cat)
Call us now for more information and to schedule your personal tour!
Mike & Krista | North Oak Real Estate Inv., Inc.
**THIS AD IS POSTED FROM NORTH OAK'S MAIN OFFICE.
FOR A QUICKER RESPONSE, PLEASE CONTACT THE ONSITE MANAGERS LISTED ABOVE DIRECTLY**
Tour may not represent the actual unit which is for lease.
Please contact the On-Site Manager for more information.
